sentences.en: a lonesome spot near the canyon
sentences.cn: 靠近峡谷的一个人烟稀少之地

sentences.en: He is sitting home all by his lonesome.
He was finding the river lonesome.
He was lonesome for a friend.
sentences.cn: 他孤独,急需找到一位朋友.

sentences.en: He was lonesome for his family when he was abroad.
sentences.cn: 他在海外时很思念他的家.

sentences.en: I felt lonesome in the strange land.
sentences.cn: 在那陌生的地方我觉得寂寞.

sentences.en: I felt so lonesome after he left.
sentences.cn: 他离开后我感到非常孤单。

sentences.en: I felt so lonesome that I most wished I was dead.
sentences.cn: 我觉得非常孤单,恨不得死了才好.

sentences.en: I get lonesome when you're not here.
I want to go home. It's so lonesome. "
sentences.cn: 我要回家, 这 实在 太寂寞了. ”

sentences.en: I've grown so lonesome, thinking of you.
sentences.cn: 想起你，我觉得非常寂寞。

sentences.en: It was getting so lonesome anyway , and now it'll be worse.
sentences.cn: 咱们呆在这儿也越来越孤单.

sentences.en: She walked in fear on the lonesome road.
sentences.cn: 她在一条人迹稀少的路上走着,心里很害怕.

sentences.en: The girl at camp hungered to go home because she was lonesome.
sentences.cn: 那女孩在夏令营中感到很孤独,非常想回家.

sentences.en: The street became lonesome after dark.
sentences.cn: 天黑以后,这条街变得冷冷清清的.

sentences.en: While he's lonesome, you should ask him for a raise.
sentences.cn: 既然他觉得孤独, 你说该要求他加薪.

words.tran_cn: 单身的；独自的；寂寞的；人迹稀少的

trans.tran_cn: 孤单的，人迹稀少的，寂，寂寥
trans.tran_en: a lonesome place is a long way from where people live and very few people go there
